title: Looking for a support who has no ego and will have blind faith in following my commands
body:
Preferably in bronze 1 or silver due to rank differences.

Headset + working mic is HIGHLY preferred

teamspeak etc

http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=whitepumah

If you play this game to have fun then you probably shouldn't bother applying.

We are aiming to play professionally and we need people with the same goal.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Roguestoney,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=PaRPj4oA,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-14T09:22:28.383+0000)
>
> You amaze me...

People like you also amaze me
ls this a serious post? Tell me its a joke...

> [{quoted}](name=Requiemsfire,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=PaRPj4oA,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-08-14T09:56:52.198+0000)
>
> ls this a serious post? Tell me its a joke...

It's as serious as he has been for the last few years... bronzie that thinks he can compete at challenger level. It's sad how delusional he is tbh.

> [{quoted}](name=Roguestoney,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=PaRPj4oA,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-08-14T23:07:00.108+0000)
>
> It's as serious as he has been for the last few years... bronzie that thinks he can compete at challenger level. It's sad how delusional he is tbh.

Those losses you see in my match history are games I have to de rank, just so I can make sure I don't reach gold so I can play with my team due to rank difference, which includes my 61 year old mother who I taught how to play the game, who right now is better than every mid laner I have ever had in solo queue. Just so we can continue the 92%+ winrate we were having skyrocketing up the ladder.

It is hilarious how in your delusions you think I am the one who is delusional and yet basic logic and maths just goes right over your head. I had to train my 61 year old mother to do a job you guys can't seem to do. Think about that for a second.

The bullshit on this one is strong hahahaha.

Mate, if you can reach gold easily then you would not need a support who follows your every command to win the game. Put pro players in bronze and give them a afk support, around 15 minutes they would start reking everyone. You are by far more than delusional to think that you can compete with challengers and above.

> [{quoted}](name=iAkeno,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=PaRPj4oA,comment-id=0002000000000000,timestamp=2016-08-15T07:59:01.844+0000)
>
> The bullshit on this one is strong hahahaha.
> 
> Mate, if you can reach gold easily then you would not need a support who follows your every command to win the game. Put pro players in bronze and give them a afk support, around 15 minutes they would start reking everyone. You are by far more than delusional to think that you can compete with challengers and above.

Give me an afk support and I end the game by 10 minutes (fastest game I have won)

The reason I can reach gold IS because I have had a support who follows my every command to win the game, and they were meant to play top but since I have yet to find a support who can play the role I am forced to have someone else who is not even in the team play top and simply not feed.

That is just to get a 92%+ winrate, I have yet to have a full team cooperating with my strategies.
